titles.title: Cash Back Reward Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a temporary deduction for interest on unsecured credit card debt.
Cash Back Reward Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Cash Back Reward Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for interest paid on an unsecured credit card in 2010. Limits the amount of such deduction to $5,000 ($10,000 for married couples filing a joint tax return).
